00068 INT MShortPulseTimes_init()
00069 {
00070   // This histogram has the pulse times on the X-axis and the number of pulses on the Y-axis
00071   // One histogram is created for each detector
00072   // This uses the TH1::kCanRebin mechanism to expand automatically to the
00073   // number of FADC banks.
00074 
00075   std::map<std::string, std::string> bank_to_detector_map = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00076   for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator mapIter = bank_to_detector_map.begin();
00077       mapIter != bank_to_detector_map.end(); mapIter++) {
00078 
00079     std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(mapIter->first);
00080     std::string histname = "h" + detname + "_ShortPulseTimes";
00081     std::string histtitle = "Plot of the short pulse times for the " + detname + " detector";
00082     TH1D* hShortPulseTime = new TH1D(histname.c_str(),histtitle.c_str(),240,0,120e6);
00083     hShortPulseTime->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Pulse time (ns)");
00084     hShortPulseTime->GetXaxis()->CenterTitle(1);
00085     hShortPulseTime->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of 4-sample pulses");
00086     hShortPulseTime->GetYaxis()->CenterTitle(1);
00087     //hShortPulseTime->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00088 
00089     std::string histname2 = "h" + detname + "_NonShortPulseTimes";
00090     std::string histtitle2 = "Plot of the non-short pulse times for the " + detname + " detector";
00091     TH1D* hNonShortPulseTime = new TH1D(histname2.c_str(),histtitle2.c_str(),240,0,120e6);
00092     hNonShortPulseTime->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Pulse time (ns)");
00093     hNonShortPulseTime->GetXaxis()->CenterTitle(1);
00094     hNonShortPulseTime->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of all other pulses");
00095     hNonShortPulseTime->GetYaxis()->CenterTitle(1);
00096     //hNonShortPulseTime->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00097 
00098     time_short_pulse_histogram_map[mapIter->first] = hShortPulseTime;
00099     time_nshort_pulse_histogram_map[mapIter->first] = hNonShortPulseTime;
00100 
00101   }
00102 
00103   return SUCCESS;
00104 }
00105 
00109 INT MShortPulseTimes(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00110 {
00111         // Get the event number
00112         int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00113 
00114         // Some typedefs
00115         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00116         typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00117         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00118 
00119         // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00120         // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00121         TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00122                 gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00123 
00124         // Loop over the map and get each bankname, vector pair
00125         for (map_iterator theMapIter = pulse_islands_map.begin(); theMapIter != pulse_islands_map.end(); theMapIter++) 
00126         {
00127           std::string bankname = theMapIter->first;
00128           std::vector<TPulseIsland*> thePulses = theMapIter->second;
00129                         
00130           // Loop over the TPulseIslands and plot the histogram
00131           for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator thePulseIter = thePulses.begin(); thePulseIter != thePulses.end(); thePulseIter++) {
00132         if (gSetup->GetDetectorName(theMapIter->first)=="CDG0" && ((*thePulseIter)->GetSamples().size()>0)) printf("\nfound caen\n");
00133 
00134         //samples = (*thePulseIter)->GetSamples();
00135         if ((*thePulseIter)->GetSamples().size()==4) time_short_pulse_histogram_map[bankname]->Fill((*thePulseIter)->GetPulseTime());        
00136         else time_nshort_pulse_histogram_map[bankname]->Fill((*thePulseIter)->GetPulseTime());
00137             
00138           }
00139 
00140         }
00141         return SUCCESS;
00142 }
